desc_content.paragraph: Custom color of the node body

field_body.paragraph: float array of 3 items in [0, 1], default (0.0, 0.0, 0.0)

desc_content.paragraph: Absolute bounding box dimensions of the node

field_body.paragraph: float array of 2 items in [-inf, inf], default (0.0, 0.0), (readonly)
float array of 2 items in [-100000, 100000], default (0.0, 0.0)

desc_content.paragraph: Parent this node is attached to
Draw node in viewport textured draw mode

Use custom color for the node
Width of the node in hidden state
True if a registered node type
If non-null output is returned, the node type can be added to the tree
If non-null output is returned, the node can be added to the tree
Handle creation of a link to or from the node

field_body.paragraph: link (NodeLink, (never None)) – Link, Node link that will be inserted

desc_content.paragraph: Initialize a new instance of this node
Initialize a new instance of this node from an existing node

field_body.paragraph: node (Node, (never None)) – Node, Existing node to copy
layout (UILayout, (never None)) – Layout, Layout in the UI

desc_content.paragraph: Draw node buttons in the sidebar

field_body.paragraph: layout (UILayout, (never None)) – Layout, Layout in the UI
